special_text:
Time loop [i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Remove them all after III.)[/i]
I – [i]“Here, I will make my home, my prison, my rock to which I am forever bound.”[/i]
II – [i]“If I am to live in this world in perpetuity, it will join me at the dusk of time.”[/i]
III – You may cast a copy of the exiled card without paying its mana cost.
